trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.AnyEventRaised"></xref> event.
The BuildEventArgs class is an abstract base class for all <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework> event argument classes.
trans-unit.target: Klassen BuildEventArgs er en abstrakt basisklasse for alle <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework>argumentet klasser.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs> constructor takes no parameters, and sets the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.TimeStamp%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A> and the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A> property to the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen av den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs>konstruktøren tar ingen parametere, og angir de <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.TimeStamp%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A>og <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A>egenskapen gjeldende tråd.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.TimeStamp%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword*>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName*> values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <> </> *>, <> </> *>, og <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName*>verdier.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName*>

trans-unit.source: The text of the event.
The Help keyword associated with the event.
The source of the event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The text of the event.
The Help keyword associated with the event.
The source of the event.
The date and time to associate with the event.
trans-unit.target: Datoen og klokkeslettet som skal knyttes til hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets location contextual information.
This is attached to logging events to define where they are located in relation to the process, engine, project, target, or task that is executing.
trans-unit.target: Dette er koblet til loggingshendelser til å definere hvor de er plassert i forhold til prosessen, motoren, prosjektet, mål eller oppgaven kjører.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext"></xref> object representing the location contextual information.
Gets the Help keyword for the event.
The Help keyword for the event.
Gets the message for the event.
The message for the event.
Gets the name of the <xref:System.Object> raising the event.
The name of the <xref:System.Object> raising the event.
Gets an integer identifier for the thread that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Henter en heltall-ID for tråden som hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An integer identifier for the thread that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall identifikatoren for tråden som hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time the event was raised as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: Henter tiden hendelsen ble opp som et <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The time the event was raised as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: Tidspunktet hendelsen ble opp som et <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>
